mapper.insert: Insert into users (account, employee_id, user_position, password, user_name, user_email, user_access_level,profile_img,user_created_at,department_id) Values (#{account},#{employeeId},#{userPosition},#{password},#{userName}, #{userEmail},"USER",#{profileImage},#{userCreateAt},#{departmentId})
